description: Erection of a single storey rear extension with the removal of two windows and a door on the side elevation, alteration to the roof including a rear roof extension, and construction of a basement with lightwells.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [Location Plan PP-12875488v2, Fire Statement, Unnumbered Fire Plan: Received 20/03/2024. A010, A011, A012, A013: Receive 16/04/2024. AL(00)08, AL(02)01 Rev B, AL(02)03 Rev B, AL(02)02 Rev B, AL(01)05 Rev B, AL(01)04 Rev B, AL(01)03 Rev B, AL(01)02 Rev A, AL(03)01 Rev B: Received 30/10/2024. AL(01)01 Rev A, Construction Method Statement, Flood Risk Assessment: Received 11/12/2024].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.

Condition : 4 - The basement shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.
Reason: To ensure use of the building does not prejudice the amenities of adjacent neighbours, in accordance with Policy CC2 of the Local Plan.

Condition : 5 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.
Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring residents.

Condition : 6 - Works shall be carried out in accordance with the hereby approved Construction Method Statement. 
Reason: In order to safeguard the amenities of neighbouring properties and to satisfy the requirements of policies CC1, CC2 and SC7 of the Local Plan.
